HP 200 Pro G4 Core i3 10th Gen All-in-One PC

The HP 200 Pro G4 Core i3 10th Gen All-in-One PC is a powerful and versatile desktop computer that may be used at home or in the business. It has a 10th-generation Intel Core-i3-10110U processor with speeds of up to 2.1GHz and a boost frequency of up to 4.1GHz for improved performance. full_description:
HP Pro 240 G9 Core i3 12th Gen All-in-One Desktop PC

The HP Pro 240 G9 Core i3 12th Gen All-in-One Desktop PC is the epitome of efficiency and versatility in the world of computing. Designed to meet the demands of both home and office users, this sleek and compact all-in-one desktop offers a seamless computing experience with its powerful hardware and impressive features. This all-in-one PC is the Intel Core i3-1215U processor, boasting 10M Cache and a turbo clock speed of up to 4.40 GHz. This 12th-generation Intel processor ensures lightning-fast performance for everyday tasks, multitasking, and even handling light to moderate computing tasks with ease. Equipped with 8GB of DDR4 RAM, the HP Pro 240 G9 provides efficient multitasking capabilities, allowing you to run multiple applications simultaneously without experiencing slowdowns. The 512GB SSD (Solid State Drive) storage ensures rapid data access and shorter boot times, making your computing experience smoother and more responsive. The 23.8-inch Full HD (1920x1080) display offers crisp and clear visuals, making it perfect for both work and entertainment purposes. Whether you're working on spreadsheets, watching movies, or video conferencing, the vibrant screen delivers an immersive viewing experience. This PC comes in a space-saving all-in-one design that eliminates clutter by integrating the computer components into the display. The sleek and modern aesthetics of the HP Pro 240 G9 will seamlessly blend into any environment, whether it's your home office or a corporate workspace. To ensure a hassle-free setup, HP includes a USB keyboard and mouse with the PC, so you can start using it right out of the box. The included peripherals are comfortable to use and complement the overall design of the system. The HP Pro 240 G9 Core i3 12th Gen All-in-One Desktop PC is the ideal choice for users seeking a reliable and efficient computing solution. Whether you're working on projects, browsing the web, or enjoying multimedia content, this all-in-one PC offers a powerful and convenient platform to meet your needs. Upgrade your computing experience with the HP Pro 240 G9.

full_description:
HP 24-cb1489d Core i5 12th Gen Touchscreen All-in-One PC

The HP 24-cb1489d Core i5 12th Gen All-in-One PC features a 23.8" diagonal, FHD (1920 x 1080), IPS, four-sided micro-edge, anti-glare, 250 nits, and 72% NTSC display. The HP 24-cb1489d All-in-One PC comes with an Intel Core i5-1235U (12M Cache, 3.30 GHz, up to 4.40 GHz), 8GB DDR4-3200MHz RAM, Intel Iris X Graphics, 1 TB 5400 rpm SATA HDD (2.5 in), and 256 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD. One SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps transfer rate, two USB 2.0 Type-A ports, and one RJ-45 connection are included with this AIO. Its power source is a 65 W Smart AC power adapter. An HP 710 Black Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo are included with this PC. This HP 24-cb1489d All-in-One PC comes with a 03-year warranty.

full_description:
HP Pavilion 27-ca1789d Core i7 12th Gen All-in-One PC

The HP Pavilion 27-ca1789d Core i7 12th Gen All-in-One PC has a 27" FHD(1920 x1080) Non-Touch Antiglare IPS Display. This Desktop PC contains an Intel Core i7-12700T (25M Cache, up to 4.70 GHz) processor, 16GB of memory, and 1TB of SSD storage. It also includes Intel UHD 770 integrated graphics. This HP Pavilion 27-ca1789d has 1 SuperSpeed USB Type-C 5Gbps signaling rate, 1 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate, 2 USB 2.0 Type-A, 1 RJ-45 connectors, and an integrated 10/100/1000 GbE LAN Network Interface. This PC includes an HP True Vision 5 MP IR privacy camera with temporal noise reduction, integrated dual array digital microphones, and a 1.4 m camera sensor. Its power supply is a 150 W AC adaptor. The HP Pavilion 27-ca1789d i7 12th Gen AIO PC comes with a 03-year warranty.
